feed.title: Why OpenTimestamps does not "linearize" its transactions

author.name: Undiscussed Horrific Abuse, One Victim of Many 2022-06-14 11:39:39

entry.title: Why OpenTimestamps does not "linearize" its transactions
entry.summary: The Opentimestamps system, since its inception, has been designed to be broken. However, if one has the energy to normalize or support a better system than Opentimestamps, it would be wonderful. It is believed that the Opentimestamps ecosystem is experienced at defending itself.
